meta.name: The 1% Club Rollover
meta.description: The 1% Club Rollover works the same way as the Original show, but if the prize pot is not won on one show, it will rollover to the next day's show. If all the pots rollover, there could be up to £500,000 being up for grabs!

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Lee Mack hosts a special edition of the quiz in which the prize pot that is not won on one show is carried over to the next day's edition, meaning a potential jackpot of £500,000. What's more, anyone who makes it through to the final question automatically comes back to compete again the following day.
